events.message: I recently bought a jacket but it does not fit and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible because the return window is closing.
The case has been reviewed and categorized as a refund request due to customer wanting to return the purchased item.
Assigning this refund case to Agent Carol from the Returns Department for prompt assistance.
Hello! I’m Carol from customer support. I understand you want to process a refund for your jacket. I’m here to help you with it.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return? This will help us expedite your refund request.
Sure, the order number is 7834512. The jacket is too small despite checking the size chart carefully.
Thank you for the info. I have initiated your refund process. Please send the jacket back using our prepaid shipping label. Refund will be processed once we receive the item.
Thanks for the prompt help. I appreciate the prepaid label as it simplifies the return for me.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Hello again! We wanted to check in and confirm that you received your refund successfully and are satisfied with the resolution.
Since we have not heard back, we are closing your refund case. Please reach out any time if you have further questions or concerns.
We have sent a short survey regarding your refund experience. Your feedback helps us improve our services.
